GameSaveManager_Translation.Title: Scheduled Tasks
GameSaveManager_Translation.Info: Here you can setup GameSave Manager to run backups at times you specify. 'Scheduled Tasks' can be configured to backup specific--or all detected--saves and overwrite various Program Settings, giving you greater control and flexibility.

List.NoEntries:
No 'Scheduled Tasks' currently defined.
To begin, click the 'Add' button below.

Step1.Info:
This wizard will guide you through the process of adding--or modifying--a 'Scheduled Task'.
Throughout this wizard, you'll be asked to specify what you wish to backup, when to perform the backup and a few program settings you may wish to overwrite. This process shouldn't take longer than 5 minutes. Remember, you can cancel at any time.
To begin, let's name our Scheduled Task. You can call this entry anything you wish, but it's recommended that you call it something meaningful for future reference.
